Aptitude.question: If a train travels at 60 km/h, how long will it take to cover a distance of 300 km?
What is 15% of 200?
A shopkeeper buys an article for ₹400 and sells it for ₹500. What is his profit percentage?
If A can do a piece of work in 10 days and B can do it in 15 days, how many days will they take to complete it together?
What is the next number in the series: 2, 4, 8, 16, ___?
A sum of money doubles itself in 8 years at simple interest. What is the rate of interest per annum?
If 5 men can complete a task in 10 days, how many days will 10 men take to complete the same task?
The average of 5 numbers is 30. If one number is excluded, the average becomes 28. What is the excluded number?
What is the square root of 625?
If 3x + 7 = 22, what is the value of x?
A man walks at a speed of 5 km/h. How much distance will he cover in 3 hours?
What is the product of 12 and 15?
If a car covers 120 km in 2 hours, what is its speed?
A mixture contains milk and water in the ratio 3:2. If there are 15 liters of milk, what is the total volume of the mixture?
What is the value of (4+5) * 2 - 3?
If the price of an article increases from ₹80 to ₹100, what is the percentage increase?
Find the simple interest on ₹1000 at 5% per annum for 2 years.
What is the least common multiple (LCM) of 4 and 6?
A cylindrical tank has a radius of 7m and a height of 10m. What is its volume? (Use π = 22/7)
If 1 dozen eggs cost ₹60, what is the cost of 5 eggs?
A student scores 70, 80, and 90 in three tests. What is the average score?
What is 0.25 as a fraction?
If today is Tuesday, what day will it be in 100 days?
A circle has a radius of 7 cm. What is its circumference? (Use π = 22/7)
What is the missing number: 1, 3, 6, 10, 15, ___?
If a car travels 240 km in 4 hours, what distance will it cover in 7 hours at the same speed?
What is the highest common factor (HCF) of 12 and 18?
A man buys an item for ₹500 and sells it at a loss of 10%. What is the selling price?
What is the value of 5! (5 factorial)?
If A:B = 2:3 and B:C = 4:5, what is A:C?
A watch gains 5 seconds every hour. How much time will it gain in 24 hours?
What is the area of a rectangle with length 10 cm and width 8 cm?
If 20% of a number is 50, what is the number?
Find the odd one out: Apple, Orange, Banana, Potato.
The sum of three consecutive integers is 60. What is the smallest integer?
A train passes a pole in 10 seconds. If the speed of the train is 36 km/h, what is the length of the train?
What is the value of 2^5?
If the perimeter of a square is 48 cm, what is the length of its side?
Which of the following is a prime number?
A father is twice as old as his son. If their combined age is 60 years, how old is the son?
What is the average of the first 5 natural numbers?
If 1 kg of apples costs ₹120, what is the cost of 750 grams of apples?
What is the area of a triangle with base 10 cm and height 6 cm?
Find the missing term: B, D, F, H, ___
A sum of ₹5000 is invested at 10% compound interest per annum for 2 years. What is the amount received at the end of 2 years?
What is the value of (10 + 5) * (8 - 3)?
If all dogs are animals, and all animals need water, then all dogs need water. This is an example of:
A and B are in the ratio 2:3. If A = 10, what is B?
What is the next number in the sequence: 100, 96, 92, 88, ___?
How many seconds are there in an hour?
If a sum of money triples itself in 10 years at simple interest, what is the rate of interest per annum?
What is the volume of a cube with side length 5 cm?
If 15% of X is 45, what is X?
Find the odd one out: Table, Chair, Sofa, Television.
A tap fills a tank in 6 hours. Another tap empties it in 12 hours. If both are open, how long will it take to fill the tank?
What is the value of 0.5 + 0.25 + 0.125?
If the ratio of boys to girls in a class is 3:2 and there are 18 boys, how many girls are there?
What is the common difference in the arithmetic progression: 3, 7, 11, 15, ...?
A clock shows 3:00. What is the angle between the hour and minute hands?
If a car's fuel tank is 2/3 full and holds 45 liters, how many liters can it hold in total?
What is the perimeter of a semicircle with radius 7 cm? (Use π = 22/7)
In a certain code, 'BAT' is written as 'ACT'. How is 'CAT' written in that code?
If the sum of two numbers is 20 and their difference is 4, what are the numbers?
A and B together can do a work in 10 days. A alone can do it in 15 days. How many days will B alone take to do the work?
What is the least number which when divided by 8, 12, and 15 leaves a remainder of 3 in each case?
If 1 pound = 0.45 kg, how many pounds are there in 9 kg?
What is the number that comes next in the series: 1, 4, 9, 16, 25, ___?
If 'WATER' is coded as 'XBUFS', how is 'FIRE' coded?
